reviewText: This is the best overall stretch, balance and movement video I have ever used.  It is wonderful for those with limited capacity.  I had only used it one time and could tell such a difference.  We bought a 2nd set to use in the community room of our apartment building for those who want to join us in using them.  You could add some cardio such as walking to it and have a well rounded exercise routine.  They are also just the right length.
